text: Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake who assumed duties as the 22nd Commander of the Sri Lanka Army called on President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat, yesterday (11). Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake met the President to formally inform the President of his assumption of duties as the Commander of the Sri Lanka Army.The Commander also presented a memento to the President on this occasion.Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake who assumed duties as the 22nd Commander of the Sri Lanka Army called on President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidential Secretariat, yesterday (11).
